definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody

sentences.english: Adjustable flybar clamp plates are supplied as standard with this machine model.
sentences.chinese: 只提供标准可调较搭尾模式。

sentences.english: Investigation on control technique of adjustabl. e double loop optical buffer in large range.
sentences.chinese: 大范围可调的双环全光缓存器的控制技术的研究。

sentences.english: High & direction of Turnplate is adjustable and it is very convenient.
sentences.chinese: 转盘的高度和方向可调，非常方便。

sentences.english: AIRSPEED BUGS, Adjustable pointers on the airspeed indicator.
sentences.chinese: 空速游标，空速表上的可调指标。

sentences.english: Including jig adjustment device, which can be adjusted in XY direction.
sentences.chinese: 含夹具可调装置，能在XY方向调节。

sentences.english: The gap between crushing blade and sieve can be adjusted.
sentences.chinese: 粉碎刀与筛网间隙可调。

sentences.english: Extra steps were required because I am installing adjustable rudder pedals.
sentences.chinese: 额外的步骤需要，因为我安装可调式舵踏板。

sentences.english: Configuration of adjustable overtemperature protection, motor overload protection.
sentences.chinese: 配置可调式超温保护，马达过载保护。

sentences.english: The turntable possesses 2 adjusting elements for the basic centring.
sentences.chinese: 转台拥有2个可调元件用于定心。

sentences.english: Based on isenthalpic process the dynamic model of adjustable J-T valve was build up.
sentences.chinese: 根据等焓过程建立了可调节流阀动态模型。

sentences.english: The 4D adjustable printer head is convenient for printing labels of different materials.
sentences.chinese: 四向位可调式打印头，便于配合不同标签材质的应用。

sentences.english: A continuously variable potentiometer is connected into the detector bridge network.
sentences.chinese: 在检测器桥路中，接有可调电位器。

sentences.english: Pajama pants feature a drawstring waist tie for an easy, adjustable fit.
sentences.chinese: 睡裤功能束带腰部绑了一个简单的，可调适合。

sentences.english: Adjustable transit speed of conveyor belt with accurate temperature control device.
sentences.chinese: 网带传输速度可调，并配有准确可靠的温控装置。

sentences.english: Known as adjustable-rate mortgages, the loans have interest rates that can double after two years.
sentences.chinese: 这些可调利率抵押贷款也许在两年后会利率翻倍。

sentences.english: An intelligent switching power supply which has adjustable output is designed.
sentences.chinese: 设计了一种输出可调智能开关稳压电源。

definition: harmonious/to adjust/to tune (e.g. wireless receiver)/to bring into harmony
cooling and heating/air conditioning and central heating
dip/angle of dip (inclination of a geological plane down from horizontal)/tilt (inclination of ship from vertical)
